description:
No more repurposing old household cleaner bottles. Bundled with 4 pouches of Muc-Off’s Punk Powder bike cleaner, is their aluminum Bottle For Life. Coloured in classic Muc-Off pink the Bottle For Life makes it easy to find your cleaner in dark garages. Punk Powder has the same cleaning power as Muc-Off’s pink cleaner, and is fully plastic free and biodegradable. Easy to use, simply rinse your bike, spray on the cleaner and let it sit 3-5 minutes, scrub any heavily soiled areas, and rinse off.

  • 1L Bottle For Life has a stable silicone bumper to keep it standing tall and looking good
  • Safe on all surfaces, including raw carbon fibre
  • Fast dissolving formula, so less mixing and more riding
  • Each 30g packet mixes up 1L of bike cleaner
  • Powder format saves water and uses 92% less packaging than 4 of Muc-Off’s 1L bottles of cleaner
  • Alkaline based and free from alcohol, CFCs, EDTA, solvents or acids
  • Plastic free formulation
  • Sachets are compostable
  • Packets have a 3-year shelf life, keeping you in cleaner for future seasons
name: Muc-Off Punk Powder (4-pack) with Aluminum Bottle
